  • Bond It SBR Admixture 5 ltr

Bond It SBR Admixture 5 ltr

Item Code: 547950001

Sign in for trade prices

Not got a trade card? Get one now!

Check Stock in Branch
  • Overview
  • Specifications
  • Datasheets

Overview

An SBR latex which increases flexibility of cement screeds and mortars and improves chemical and water resistance and durability. Suitable for internal and external floors and rendering in areas of continual or intermittent water and chemical contact. Excellent waterproofing admix that improves adhesion of cementitious screeds and reduces shrinkage and cracking when repairing floor screeds. Also ideal as a bonding agent for new to old concrete.

Benefits

  • Can be used as a bonding agent, as an admixture or general purpose primer
  • Improves adhesion of cementitious screeds
  • Improves durability, workability and cohesion
  • Reduces shrinkage and cracking when repairing floor screeds
  • Ideal bonding agent for new to old concrete
  • increases resistance to water and chemicals

Specifications

Volume (Litres) 5L
Weight (kg) 5.3
Use Internal and External

Datasheets

Supplier Website: www.bond-it.co.uk
